大多数州尚未永久资助 988。呼叫中心需要确定性。自从国家预防自杀生命线一年前改用三位数的危机电话号码 988 以来，拨打该热线的电话、聊天和短信数量增加了 33%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Most-states-have-yet-to-permanently-fund-988-Call-centers-want-certainty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Most-states-have-yet-to-permanently-fund-988-Call-centers-want-certainty.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7abb31f-f5fd-4583-9935-9f7d10ea5d17 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 07:05:31 -0400 Most states have yet to permanently fund 988. Call centers want certainty.
